clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in diabetic kidney disease

incompatibilities.description: The excretion of Tipiracil can be decreased when combined with Pimagedine
The excretion of Varenicline can be decreased when combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Prazosin can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Solriamfetol can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Ranitidine can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Linagliptin can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Choline salicylate can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Choline can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Metformin can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Norepinephrine can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Reserpine can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Pramipexole can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Cimetidine can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Epinephrine can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Lamivudine can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Amantadine can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
The serum concentration of Dopamine can be increased when it is combined with Pimagedine
